title: Kicked out of game, can't reconnect
body: I'm able to ping league servers, post on the forums, and see users logging on and off in client while waiting for the reconnect button to appear, but not reconnect to a game I've been booted from! Is there something going on with the server?

replies.body: 3 games in a row where I've been kicked out of the match after champ select and have not been able to reconnect at all...  What's the word on this issue?
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/3Lmbjp8Y-3132017-na-server-issues

Well they finally admitted it's worth taking ranked play down, still no red post on the subject of why League isn't working, though Meddler's on talking about the Galio rework... so... yeah... there's that! Maybe if the playtest teams can't connect things will get done?
just tried to play a normal cant conect

> [{quoted}](name=Sp4ceG04t,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=bgpN3MOK,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2017-03-13T12:02:37.821+0000)
>
> just tried to play a normal cant conect

it's now on service status, though for some F**** reason they're still keeping the status green
Normally I'd start checklisting for network but judging by the responses it's not on my end
i thought it was a my isp being a jerk but nope my internet is working fine definitely something up with rito

> [{quoted}](name=Sp4ceG04t,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=bgpN3MOK,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2017-03-13T11:26:38.901+0000)
>
> i thought it was a my isp being a jerk but nope my internet is working fine definitely something up with rito

This is confirmed af, I ran ping tests and was having a pleasant 50ms (better than usual) ping
I'm getting an "Unable to connect to server" prompt when attempting to reconnect and if I hit cancel I'm taken back to the client with no reconnect button.

it is not only repeatable but it is costing lp the 1st game this happened to me in the game totally disappeared everyone dcd and the game was canceled i guess but i tried to get into another game and wouldn't let me connect then got leaver remake.
happening to my game as well, my irelia is currently 1v2ing an ezreal and khazix in 5v5 ranked game.....

Same here...
 not 1 minute playing and I everyone got dc'ed, 4 in my team and 1 on the other side.
It's happening for everyone
Same dunnno whats going on
Same thing happened to me, but your server status says its still working. Nothing like losing your promos, because of stuff like this.

This morning we became aware that there was, in fact, an issue impacting our servers. We since made a post about the status of the issue [**here**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/3Lmbjp8Y-3132017-na-server-issues).

Thanks for being patient while we iron this out ^_^!

It's great you are aware of and have mostly fixed the connection issues; but what are you doing about compensating the hundreds or even thousands of players that have lost LP, promos, etc? The problem persisted now for about 12 hours -- the whole day -- and not once was loss prevention enabled. Where is the compensation for those of us who had our time and efforts wasted and lost a lot of ranked game progress due to an error on your end?

Hi so I recently played a ranked game and I somehow ended up dcing from the game and was unable to even reconnect...... In fact I ended up logging back into the client only to see this huge white screen and a continuous spree of sorry you can't connect retry or cancel(when I would click cancel it would say the game was over which made no sense bc I dc'd at 5 minutes) anyway long story short I've been scammed out of my lp fix this pls
Just happened to me too in a ranked. Couldn't reconnect, internet connection was totally fine. First time in a long time this has happened.
Anyone that's following this one, confirmed from my end that a clean install is no fix at all.
Update: Tried another connect, this is officially repeatable

Update: Game ended, 9 champions were kicked, not the 0/7 eve who carried on alone and got the nexus, and according to them IP, for the game. 

If there were ever a time to investigate for an exploit...
